naslov: Istra, Brtonigla - Luksuzna kuća s bazenom, 143m2 (prodaja)
opis: Angelus Nekretnine d.o.o. agencija za nekretnine nude Vam u prodaju ovu modernu dvojnu kuću s bazenom u srcu Istarskog poluotoka - u okolici Brtonigle. LOKACIJA: U sklopu općine Brtonigla na zapadnoj obali istarskog poluotoka u Istarskoj županiji. Brtonigla udaljena je od Buja oko 5 kilometara. Lokacija se između Buja i Novigrada, udaljena 11 km od kilometarskih plaža za zapadnoj obali Istre. Kuća se nalazi u malom i mirnom istarskom mjestu udaljenom svega nekoliko minuta vožnje od Brtonigle, kao i od Novigrada i lijepih plaža. U blizini se nalazi trgovina, restorani, kafići, vinarije, škola, vrtić, park, igralište, autocesta i razni drugi sadržaji. More istarskih plaža besprijekorno je čisto, a njegova čistoća redovito se kontrolira. U Istri se more analizira na 203 plaže, a dosadašnje su analize pokazale da je na njima more visoke kakvoće, jedno od najčišćih u svijetu. Neke od istarskih plaža nagrađene su prestižnom Plavom zastavom, međunarodno priznatom oznakom za očuvanje prirode. OPIS: Površina ove moderne kuće je 143 m2, a stambeni prostor se proteže kroz prizemlje i kat. U prizemlju se nalazi prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom u open-space konceptu, kupaonica, ostava i praonica. Unutarnjim stepenicama dolazi se do kata gdje se nalaze 3 spavaće sobe, 2 kupaonice i hodnik. Jedna od spavaćih soba ima vlastitu kupaonicu i natkrivenu terasu. Kuća je opremljena modernim i kvalitetnim namještajem, te se namještena i iznajmljuje. Grijanje je osiigurano putem peći na pelete i klima uređaja kojih ima ukupno 4 komada (u svakoj sobi po jedna). Iz dnevnog boravka u prizemlju se izlazi na terasu pored koje se nalazi bazen sa sunčalištem. Terasa zajedno sa bazenom i sunčalištem zauzima središnje mjesto ove okućnice. Ostatak okućnice ispunjen je uređenim zelenim travnjakom, dok kuća posjeduje i svoja 2 vlastita parkinga na korištenje najmoprimcima. Vanjski bazen je dimenzija 10 x 3,5 m. Ova moderna kuća s bazenom je idealna za miran cjelogodišnji življenje u blizini svih sadržaja koje trebate za život u urbanoj sredini. Za više informacija kontaktirajte našeg agenta. ================================== Agencijska provizija obračunava se u skladu s Općim uvjetima poslovanja i Cjenikom objavljenim na https://angelusnekretnine.hr/o-nama Vaše Angelus nekretnine d.o.o. ________________________ ENG: Angelus Nekretnine d.o.o. real estate agency offers you for sale this modern semi-detached house with a swimming pool in the heart of the Istrian peninsula - near Brtonigla. LOCATION: As part of the Brtonigla municipality on the west coast of the Istrian peninsula in the Istrian County. Brtonigla is about 5 kilometers away from Buje. The location is between Buje and Novigrad, 11 km away from the kilometer-long beaches on the west coast of Istria. The house is located in a small and quiet Istrian village just a few minutes drive from Brtonigla, as well as from Novigrad and beautiful beaches. Nearby there are shops, restaurants, cafes, wineries, a school, kindergarten, park, playground, highway and various other facilities. The sea of Istrian beaches is impeccably clean, and its cleanliness is regularly monitored. In Istria, the sea is analyzed on 203 beaches, and previous analyses have shown that the sea on them is of high quality, one of the cleanest in the world. Some of the Istrian beaches have been awarded the prestigious Blue Flag, an internationally recognized label for nature conservation. DESCRIPTION: The surface area of this modern house is 143 m2, and the living space extends over the ground floor and first floor. On the ground floor there is a spacious living room with a kitchen and dining room in an open-space concept, a bathroom, a pantry and a laundry room. Internal stairs lead to the first floor where there are 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a hallway. One of the bedrooms has its own bathroom and a covered terrace. The house is equipped with modern and high-quality furniture, and is rented furnished. Heating is provided by a pellet stove and air conditioners, of which there are a total of 4 (one in each room). From the living room on the ground floor there is access to the terrace next to which there is a swimming pool with a sunbathing area. The terrace, together with the swimming pool and sunbathing area, occupies the central place of this garden. The rest of the garden is filled with a well-maintained green lawn, while the house also has its own 2 parking spaces for tenants to use. The outdoor pool measures 10 x 3.5 m. This modern house with a pool is ideal for peaceful year-round living close to all the amenities you need for urban living. For more information, contact our agent. ====================================== The agency fee is calculated in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions and the Price List published at https://angelusnekretnine.hr/o-nama Yours, Angelus nekretnine d.o.o.
